org.apache.flink.runtime.webmonitor.handlers

接口 RequestHandler

  • 所有已知实现类:
    AbstractExecutionGraphRequestHandler, AbstractJobVertexRequestHandler, AbstractSubtaskAttemptRequestHandler, AbstractSubtaskRequestHandler, ClusterOverviewHandler, CurrentJobIdsHandler, CurrentJobsOverviewHandler, DashboardConfigHandler, JarAccessDeniedHandler, JarActionHandler, JarDeleteHandler, JarListHandler, JarPlanHandler, JarRunHandler, JarUploadHandler, JobAccumulatorsHandler, JobCancellationHandler, JobCheckpointsHandler, JobConfigHandler, JobDetailsHandler, JobExceptionsHandler, JobManagerConfigHandler, JobPlanHandler, JobStoppingHandler, JobVertexAccumulatorsHandler, JobVertexBackPressureHandler, JobVertexCheckpointsHandler, JobVertexDetailsHandler, JobVertexTaskManagersHandler, SubtaskCurrentAttemptDetailsHandler, SubtaskExecutionAttemptAccumulatorsHandler, SubtaskExecutionAttemptDetailsHandler, SubtasksAllAccumulatorsHandler, SubtasksTimesHandler, TaskManagersHandler

    public interface RequestHandler
    Base interface for all request handlers. The handlers must produce a JSOn response.

    • 方法概要

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      String handleRequest(Map<String,String> pathParams, Map<String,String> queryParams, org.apache.flink.runtime.instance.ActorGateway jobManager)
      Core method that handles the request and generates the response.

    • 方法详细资料

      • handleRequest

        String handleRequest(Map<String,String> pathParams,
                     Map<String,String> queryParams,
                     org.apache.flink.runtime.instance.ActorGateway jobManager)
              throws Exception
        Core method that handles the request and generates the response. The method needs to respond with a valid JSON string. Exceptions may be throws and will be handled.
        参数:
        pathParams - The map of REST path parameters, decoded by the router.
        queryParams - The map of query parameters.
        jobManager - The JobManager actor.
        返回:
        The JSON string that is the HTTP response.
        抛出:
        Exception - Handlers may forward exceptions. Exceptions of type NotFoundException will cause a HTTP 404 response with the exception message, other exceptions will cause a HTTP 500 response with the exception stack trace.
